pages.title: About
pages.summary: Green Design System is the design system for Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken to make it easier and faster to build beautiful digital products and experiences under the SEB brand.

pages.title: Accessibility
pages.summary: Accessibility is central to SEB’s digital experience. The Green Design System is designed to make our services usable for everyone – improving clarity, usability, and overall experience.

pages.title: Applied design
pages.summary: Applied design shows how our visual design comes to life in concrete examples - with templates and clear guidance for building layouts.

pages.title: Spacing
pages.summary: Spacing is a fundamental tool for structuring layouts, guiding the user’s eye, and ensuring clarity in design. In Green, we use spacing to create hierarchy, balance, and visual rhythm, making interfaces feel intentional and easy to navigate.

pages.title: Visual direction
pages.summary: Our visual language helps the user to navigate, make choices and solve problems. With usability and writing as core pillars the visual design inherits the brand principles in a digital context.

pages.title: Design direction
pages.summary: At SEB, digital design is not just about aesthetics - it’s about clarity, function, and supporting the user journey. We simplify and remove obstacles, with accessibility and writing as essential parts.

pages.title: Primitives
pages.summary: The primitives represent the fundamental parts of the design system like colors, typography, spacing, and sizing. This ensures consistency across the entire design system.

pages.title: Colours
pages.summary: Colour is a powerful tool in design, shaping hierarchy, guiding attention, and reinforcing brand identity. In Green, colours work alongside whitespace and typography to create clarity and balance.

pages.title: Design tokens
pages.summary: Design tokens capture colors, typography, spacing, and other atomic design decisions as named, reusable values that are used in designs, tools and code so interfaces stay consistent and easy to update.

pages.title: Typography
pages.summary: Our typography guidelines outline how to use font styles, sizes,  and weights effectively across different elements, from headings  and body text to small UI details.

pages.title: Layout
pages.summary: Declarative layout make sure layouts stays consistent. The relationships between elements, rely on the set rules for spacing, grids, and sizing.

pages.title: UX writing
pages.summary: Wherever customers meet us, their experience of SEB should be consistent. A good experience builds trust and can lead to new business. Customer-facing text must be correct – mistakes distract and reduce credibility.
